body.p: This tab allows you stay tuned about the new features for Eclipse editor possibilities, interesting news and new apps.
Usually when you click on the tab, default web browser will be opened to see newsletter video or go to the Eclipse foundation web page.

p.b: Figure 2-9. Language Server Protocol 101 (May Newsletter) tab

body.p: See Appendix A. How to create installation from the Eclipse account if you want use your Eclipse Account for login into the Eclipse web space
